0.descriptionId:
Display/hide public messages.

It's forbidden to auction things on this channel unless your character is on one of the game's Market Places.

Warning! This channel is supervised. If you use it inappropriately you will be sanctioned accordingly.

2.descriptionId:
Display/hide guild messages.

This channel will enable you to chat with members of your guild.

3.descriptionId:
Display/hide alliance messages.

This channel allows you to communicate with other members of your alliance.

5.descriptionId:
Display/hide trade messages.

This channel allows you to view sale offers posted by players in the same zone, and to sell items to them.
This channel is subject to strict regulations. Items are to be inserted in the chat by way of links in order to make the channel easier to read.
To insert a link to an item, use the pop-up menu available on the item and choose "Insert in the Chat" or use the shortcut "SHIFT + left click" on any item.

Warning! This channel is supervised. If you use it inappropriately you will be sanctioned accordingly.

6.descriptionId:
Display/hide recruitment messages.

This channel enables you to find fellow adventurers to create or join a group. It also enables you to find members for your guild or to consult advertisements for other guilds.

Warning! This channel is supervised. If you use it inappropriately you will be sanctioned accordingly.

7.descriptionId:
Display/hide messages from the Newbies' channel.

This channel enables you to meet, help and talk with other players in Incarnam.
You must use the Trading channel if you want to sell or buy items.
You must use the Group channel if you're looking for other players, for whatever reason.

Warning! This channel is supervised. If you use it inappropriately you will be sanctioned accordingly.

12.descriptionId:
Display/hide promotional messages.

Ankama news will be displayed in this channel, including information about not-to-be-missed events, new things to discover etc.
